organizations: Facebook James Madison Shuts Out Elon
title: James Madison Shuts Out Elon, 51-0
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest James Madison Shuts Out Elon, 51-0 Vad Lee threw for 198 yards and two touchdowns to lead James Madison to a 51-0 victory over Elon. Post to Facebook James Madison Shuts Out Elon, 51-0 Vad Lee threw for 198 yards and two touchdowns to lead James Madison to a 51-0 victory over Elon.  //on.wfmy.com/1ROLi8K   Join the Conversation To   James Madison Shuts Out Elon, 51-0 James Madison vs. Elon WFMY AP/WFMY News 2 6:19 p.m. EDT October 17, 2015 Connor Christiansen hit Corey Joyner for a 25-yard touchdown and Julius Moore had the clinching interception in the third overtime to help Elon beat Gardner-Webb 21-13. (Photo: WFMY News 2 Sports) 1 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
ELON, N.C. -- Vad Lee threw for 198 yards and two touchdowns and added 66 more yards on the ground to help lead James Madison to a 51-0 victory over Elon on Saturday. 
Cardon Johnson finished with 165 yards rushing and Khalid Abdullah had 75 yards on the ground with each adding two TD's apiece for James Madison (7-0, 4-0 Colonial Athletic Association). As a team the Dukes finished with 406 yards rushing and five touchdowns and held a 604-289 advantage in total yards. 
Johnson ran 80 yards for a score on James Madison's third offensive play of the game and the Dukes never looked back, taking a 34-0 lead at halftime. 
Daniel Thompson finished with 130 yards passing for Elon (2-5, 1-3). 
The game was the first shutout for James Madison since October of 2008. 
The Dukes have won all four meetings between the two schools. Read or Share this story: http://on.wfmy.com/1ROLi8K TOP VIDEOS
